etymology.interpretation: Depicts a crescent moon, evoking the time after sunset when evening begins. By association it came to denote evening and appears productively in words related to dusk and night.

examples.chinese: 今天的夕阳很美(今天的夕陽很美)。
examples.english: The evening sun is beautiful today.

examples.chinese: 今夕我们在河畔散步(今夕我們在河畔散步)。
examples.pinyin: Jīn xī wǒmen zài hépàn sànbù.
examples.english: This evening we stroll by the river.

examples.chinese: 夕照映红了山谷(夕照映紅了山谷)。
examples.english: The evening glow reddened the valley.
